prompt: Some prisoners don't blame any frivolous people.
hint: Does 'some' mean 'at least one' or 'all of them'?
explanation: "Some" indicates an existential statement about at least one member. "P" refers to a class of things, so use uppercase. The predicate "B" refers to a class/property, so use uppercase. The "not" applies to the predication, indicating the subject lacks the property.
